event.title: held every year in the first weekend of October

data.event: Lincoln is home to the Annual Arkansas Apple Festival, held every year in the first weekend of October.
The city of Lincoln was founded in 1907, and recently hosted a centennial celebration in July 2007.

event.title: hosted a centennial celebration in July 2007

data.event: The city of Lincoln was founded in 1907, and recently hosted a centennial celebration in July 2007.
